Description:
Quiet court location
This immaculate brick veneer home must be inspected to be truly appreciated. Situated in a quiet court location yet walking distance to the beach, shops, Primary school and golf course you will find everything you need at your doorstep.
The home offers four carpeted bedrooms, two bathrooms with additional separate toilet and main bathroom with extra large shower. The formal lounge features a cathedral ceiling and slow combustion wood fire which extends through to the dining space and kitchen with commercial Technica, gas cooktops, large fan forced electric oven, built in pantry and plenty of cupboard and storage space. The living areas are tiled throughout and fitted with ceiling fan and split system air conditioning.
Nestled on a large block with neat, established gardens, installed irrigation system and secure backyard. The front and rear verandahs are ideal for relaxing or entertaining with canvas blinds fitted to the windows and clear blinds to the southside.
The attached four car garage with remote rollerdoor has high ceilings to accommodate boat/caravan storage and rear drive through sliding door.
This would make an ideal family home or addition to your investment portfolio.
Enquire now!
Insights: 7 West Court, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
ULTIMATE INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY WITH HIGH RETURNS
The phone enquiry code for this property is - 1119
Holiday let for over 3 years (5 star reviews) proving strong annual increases with plenty of opportunity to improve.
Currently receiving 10% ROI
Potential to purchase fully furnished with confirmed bookings START MAKING MONEY IMMEDIATELY!
Located in one of Australias most popular holiday locations, walking distance to 2 popular beaches, boat ramp, golf course, and direct route to winery and penguin parade.
Due to its design & amenities, it is one of the few houses that can host larger groups and therefore attracts higher occupancy rates.
Cleverly designed with 2 fully self-contained separate apartments in one house, also with a powered bungalow/studio
Either rent whole house or the Downstairs & Upstairs separately for smaller groups
Approximately 619sqm allotment
Open plan living in both apartments
3 bedrooms (2 upstairs 1 downstairs) with separate external studio currently used as 4th bedroom
2 Kitchens
2 Bathrooms both with double basins and 1 with large walk-in double shower
Outdoor entertaining area
Split system air conditioners
NBN Connected
LPG Gas Hot Water
Lots of parking area, including room for large boat
Serious buyers only. Available on request after inspection only is:
- Section 32
- Previous 3 years occupancy and earnings
- Upcoming bookings (currently only taking up to 3 months in advance bookings due to sale of property)
- Complete list of available furnishings & amenities including approx. value
- Inspections welcome, however times/dates must be flexible as only available in-between occupancies.
**Please note photos are from the AirBnB listing & were taken directly after renovations 3 years ago. Therefore please expect some minor wear on the property during inspections. Any damage that may be caused by guests during the sales/settlement process will be fixed prior to settlement.

Description:
PRACTICALITY & CONVENIENCE COMBINED
Perfectly positioned within easy walking distance to the main street of Cowes, supermarkets, cafes and restaurants and only 800m to the north facing, safe, swimming beach you will find this lovely family home.
An impressive entrance, which is large enough for a study area, leads you to the first living area,with sliding doors out to the front deck - a perfect spot for your morning cuppa.
Warm & inviting, the kitchen is the hub of this home. An island bench with room for seating, means that you can pull up a stool and have a lovely chat over a coffee, or is the perfect informal dining experience. The kitchen also features stainless steel appliances, dishwasher drawers, gas cooktop, electric oven, canopy rangehood and ample storage. Continuing out from the kitchen are the dining and 2nd living area and out to a North facing covered entertainment area and covered spa area
The home offers 4 generously sized bedrooms all with built in robes, including the master with walk in robe and ensuite,. Ceiling fans throughout the home, and split system heating & cooling provide year round comfort.
Additional features include garden shedding, double carport plus additional parking space for a boat or caravan. All set on a 676 m2 (approx.) block this property offers a great opportunity for permanent or holiday living.

Description:
WAREHOUSE INSPIRED HOME ON THE FORESHORE
Facing north towards a beautiful tree lined path to the beach, waking up will never be difficult again in this stunning and unique home. Giving a sense of calm and serenity, the sound of the ocean laps outside the balcony of the master bedroom, with sensational views and a myriad of bird and wildlife adding to the chorus.
Drawing inspiration in design from Eileen Gray's E-1027 villa in Roquebrune-Cap-Martin and with construction overseen by Martin Builders of Grand Designs Australia fame, this prized waterfront property exudes quality, discreet privacy and calm considered floor plans that allow for flexible eco-friendly living.
A very special home that is both private and secluded, the chance to purchase a property such as this is extremely rare. With pristine beaches and sparkling waters only a few steps from your back garden makes it all the more impossible to resist. Relaxing & entertaining will take on a whole new meaning for you in this extraordinary setting.

Description:
Cute as a button
This cute as a button beach house is ready to go with a recent update completed. It features two bedrooms with built in robes, sunny open plan living flowing onto a choice of decking both front and back perfect for entertaining.
It also features one central bathroom with combined laundry and separate toilet. All on a huge, low maintenance block with glimpses of the bay, single garage/shed at rear and a short walk to the beach this great home will not last long.
Currently tenanted by excellent tenants until 1st March 2021 paying $1217 per calendar month it is perfect for the investor or future use as the perfect holiday home.

Description:
Want to enjoy the convenience of living with everything at your doorstep?
It offers just that and presents itself with an outstanding holiday rental opportunity.
Beautifully appointed streetfront two bedroomed single level unit with quality modern appliances. It is light and airy and has a lovely outdoor setting on the deck, perfect for breakfast on a lovely morning.
The residence incorporates a central and light filled open plan living, kitchen, dining area, two robed bedrooms and two bathrooms. The master bedroom is complete with an ensuite and further to this is also a spacious laundry and single garage.
With additional extras being: ducted heating and cooling, polished timber floors, North facing entertainment area, stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances to the kitchen.
This property is within easy walking distance to the doctors, primary schools, Cowes beach and local shops/cafes.
This is a great chance to extend your investment portfolio as the residence is currently being used as a holiday rental, otherwise it would make for the perfect low maintenance permanent home.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Only 350m From The Beach!
What an opportunity! This double storey 4 bedroom Cowes property is situated in an ideal location, close to the beach, and walking distance to cafes, shops and restaurants.
With 2 living areas, 4 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, 2 bathrooms and outdoor entertaining deck - the property is suitable for large families or groups - making it perfect for holiday or permanent living.
The home features a cozy slow combustion heater for the winter months, and split system cooling to keep you cool throughout the warmer summer months.
Situated on a generous 612sqm allotment, there is plenty of room for boat, car and caravan parking - with fully fenced rear yard and a single garage.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
A Perfect Waterside Environment
Situated in an exclusive pocket of Cowes, and only 80 metres from the pristine north facing Cowes beach, this home is sure to excite.
The double storey, brick veneer residence comprises 4 bedrooms, 3 living zones and 3 bathrooms. The downstairs level has a modern kitchen/dining area, complimented by stainless steel appliances and glass splash backs along with a spacious main living, second formal living, rumpus room, 3 generous bedrooms and 2 renovated bathrooms.
The spiral timber staircase leads you to the master bedroom with ensuite and parents retreat with its own balcony that takes in views of the bay.
Other great features include polished floors, double glazed windows, split system heating/cooling, combustion heating, double garage, expansive undercover entertainment deck that extends off the formal living space. Boats, caravans and trailers are catered for with additional side access to the property.
All set on a 696sqm approx. allotment with lovely established surrounds. This property currently has a great tenancy in place. Inspection will impress.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Red Rocks Delight
Just minutes away from the beautiful Red Rocks beach, this double storey residence combines a great position with a relaxing ambience and the feel of being on holidays. Easy living is ensured, both indoors and out, allowing you to sit back and relax in the tranquil surroundings.
The upstairs open plan living/kitchen and dining areas flows out on to the wrap-around balcony. There is also a further two bedrooms and main bathroom on this level.
Downstairs is complete with two bedrooms, family/games room and a second bathroom.
Other great features include split system heating and cooling, combustion heating with a flu to upstairs living ensuring year-round comfort to both levels, cedar lined ceilings enhancing the feeling of warmth and character to the upstairs area and ample storage.
Currently being used as a holiday rental - this property would be the ideal investment opportunity, as it is ready to go and will allow for instant rental income.
All of this is set within a 617sqm approx. fully fenced allotment.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Stylish outdoor entertaining
This flawless and contemporary single level home, positioned in the popular Whytesands Estate combines a modern interior with a beautifully landscaped garden allowing the new owner to move straight in and enjoy the Island lifestyle.
Boasting two living zones, four spacious robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master bedroom is complete with a walk in robe and ensuite.
The undercover alfresco area flows off the main living space and provides year round comfort with the privacy of the established landscaped surrounds, completed by one of the Island's most renowned landscapers. This outdoor area is an absolute entertainers dream with a built in Pizza Oven and outdoor fire pit.
A host of additional features include: high ceilings throughout, split system heating and cooling units, stainless steel appliances, 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, stone bench tops to the kitchen, LED lights, garden shed and a double garage with direct access through to the walk in pantry.
All of this is set within a 540sqm approx. fully fenced allotment.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Phillip Island.

Description:
Walk to shops and schools
Located a short walk in to the hub of Cowes CBD to do your shopping, or to the new Catholic Primary School or the existing Cowes Primary.
A quiet location suitable as a peaceful holiday destination or permanent home for a family or retirees. A spacious well planned three large bedroom/two bathroom home/built in robes (including ensuite and walk in robe to master). Large bedrooms, family bathroom with bathtub, light and airy open plan kitchen/dining/living zone is looking new in its near four years young.
A thoughtful deck facing north/east is sheltered from the prevailing weather which boasts a beautiful green landscaped garden filled with vegies, fruit trees, outdoor shower and tall trees surrounding the perimeter providing privacy. The long deck is a great space to enjoy the sunshine and to host a barbeque with friends or family.
Other features include 6 star rating, floor/wall and ceiling insulation, reverse cycle heating and cooling, low maintenance entrance, carport with high roof line for boat or caravan to fit perfectly.

Description:
Coastal Charm With Water Views
Beautifully positioned at the Red Rocks end of Cowes is this divine and much loved seaside cottage with loads of coastal charm. A welcoming entry complimented by a covered outdoor area invites you into the immaculately presented and stylishly renovated home offering two good sized bedrooms, a light filled open plan kitchen, dining and living area, family bathroom, separate toilet and a european laundry.
Large picture windows in the living area and main bedroom have a peaceful vista across farmland to Western Port Bay. Relax on the expansive back deck, large enough to entertain family and friends, while enjoying the picturesque water view and sunsets.
This delightful home boasts many great features such as built in bench seats in the dining space, oiled timber floors throughout, a cosy wood fire, split system heating and cooling, retro internal and external doors, bespoke reclaimed timber bench tops and built in robes. A fabulous storage shed at the rear could also be utilised as additional accommodation.
This gorgeous property would ideally suit as an excellent weekend retreat or low maintenance permanent home located just a short stroll to the desirable Red Rocks beach and within a few minutes to Phillip Island's attractions.
*A huge bonus of this property is that it overlooks Saltwater Creek which is protected from development by an S173 environmental overlay.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Dreaming of foreshore living?
Here is a unique opportunity to buy a property on the Cowes foreshore with fabulous bay views without the million dollar price tag.
This immaculate apartment has fantastic bay views and fronts onto the Cowes beach and park area. Presenting a great opportunity for low maintenance coastal living it is ready to just move in and enjoy. Spacious and well appointed, the apartment offers three bedrooms, a family bathroom and convenient ensuite, large living and dining space, full kitchen with dishwasher and huge balcony to take in the gorgeous views.
You won't need a car, listen to the waves lapping on the beach, walk to the restaurants, stroll to the shops or sit on the beach.
Apartments of this size and quality do not come on the market often. Ideal investment for a holiday destination for all the family, or rent it out and enjoy a generous income.
Insights: 12 other 3 bedroom unit in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Deluxe Entertaining!
Situated in a tightly held, quiet court locale only 400m (approx.) to the popular Red Rocks Road beach is this near new modern and spacious four-bedroom family home.
Downstairs features a fabulous floor plan encompassing the master suite with walk in robe and ensuite, powder room, home office/study, open plan living/kitchen and dining. The undercover alfresco area flows effortlessly off the main living space via sliding doors and is complete with built in cabinetry, BBQ, fridge and cafe blinds. This is an entertainers dream!
The well-appointed kitchen is complimented with stone benchtops, 900mm gas cooktop and electric oven, two-draw dishwasher, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry.
Upstairs offers a further three robed bedrooms, study which could be utilised as a fifth bedroom, main bathroom, second living area and an upstairs verandah.
With a host of additional features including: x2 split system heating and cooling units, gas fireplace, bamboo flooring, carpet and tiles throughout, garage, outside shower, high ceilings and laundry with plenty of storage.
The property hosts ample car accommodation with plenty of side access and a carport with extra high clearance perfect for a boat or caravan. All of this is set within a 645sqm approx. fully fenced allotment and would be the perfect permanent residence.
Insights: 9 Cypress Court, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 14 other 5 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Position, Position, Views
A well priced property which is a short walking distance to the CBD of Cowes offering shops, restaurants plus Primary School, Golf Course and not to mention the beautiful Silverleaves Beach. The views look out over the back 9 holes of the Cowes Golf Course, ocean beyond and out to the cliffs of Corinella.
A two storey home featuring a master bedroom with a modern ensuite, walk in robe and it's own balcony, a separate powder room, a quality kitchen including a walk in pantry and modern appliances featuring a 900mm wide electric cooktop and under bench oven and Caesar stone bench tops. Upstairs, the large open plan living and dining area flows naturally through to the covered outdoor entertaining area boasting beautiful rural views.
The lower level comprises three good sized bedrooms, a family bathroom and a second living area overlooking the large privately fenced yard providing plenty of room for kids to play. Currently tenanted with a long term caring tenant who looks after the home as if it were their own.
Explore the investment opportunity.
Insights: 15 Waterford Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING, READY TO MOVE IN TO
Located in an exclusive cul-de-sac, at the quiet end of Church Street, only a short stroll to a very private beach and also a short stroll to the nature walk leading to Red Rocks Beach.
This near new townhouse is perfect for those who want to escape the rat race and spend quiet leisurely time beachside and, if the need for shopping arises, only 5 min to the Cowes main street by car.
Set over two levels, this stunning townhouse is superbly appointed with quality fixtures & fittings. The upstairs area consists of the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with walk in shower & spa, and a beautiful open plan kitchen, dining and living area, with split system air conditioning offering year round comfort. The fully equipped kitchen, includes large walk in pantry, 900mm stainless steel electric oven with gas cooktop, and stainless steel dishwasher. The island bench offers convenient, relaxed dining. The dining area leads to the living area and then out to a covered balcony.
Downstairs there are 2 bright and airy bedrooms with built in robes, both serviced by an impressive main bathroom with bath plus separate powder room. The laundry is conveniently located in the single garage which has direct access into the townhouse, as well as access to a generous rear courtyard with low maintenance landscaped gardens.
A bonus is the ample storage- a lock up shed in the rear yard, lock up storage under the staircase, and large linen cupboard.
Insights: 5 IBIS COURT, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
What an Opportunity!
This single level home opens up to a spacious interior compromising of a living room, dining area and kitchen; three separate good sized bedrooms, the master with full ensuite, a family bathroom and laundry.
Sitting on a generously sized allotment of 596sqm approximately, this home offers fantastic potential for renovations and additions. For the investor it offers the perfect investment being already permanently let. A little love is all this property needs to reach its full potential.
Sitting in one of Phillip Island's most favourite and sought after positions for its central location, surrounded by lifestyle and retail amenities, from pristine bay and surf beaches, golf course, Cowes shopping/restaurant hub and the famous Phillip Island Penguin Parade to name a few. Just a ninety minute drive from Melbourne's CBD to one of Australia's favourite holiday destinations.
Ideal for the first home buyer or truly a great opportunity to purchase a seaside home in a leading holiday destination. Call now as I don't expect this property to last long.

Description:
Exemplary in Design
Located in the ever-popular Cowes precinct is this beautifully designed, modern family home. Boasting sophistication throughout and only a short drive to all of what the town has to offer, this property is a must see!
The home features four spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes, the master with enormous walk in robe and full ensuite, an elegant main bathroom, formal dining room, second living/study area and the modern open plan living/kitchen/dining area which effortlessly flows out to the fully covered entertaining area, overlooking the low maintenance surrounds.
With a host of additional features including; an 8 camera security system, double glazed windows, double garage, 6KW solar system, solar hot water system, 900ml gas cooktop, electric wall oven, enormous walk in pantry, stone benchtops, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans, garden shed and with approximately 5 years remaining on the new home warranty.
All of this on a low maintenance 531 sqm approx., fully fenced allotment.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
SPACIOUS ALLOTMENT TITLED AND READY TO BUILD.
If you are looking to purchase one of the only allotments close to the water then look no further. This allotment offers a full East west block with a northly aspect.
Titled land and ready to build a new home and take advantage of the location and position just near the Shearwater lake.
The SHEARWATER estate, is a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate.
Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk (700m approx) away, with the Heath lands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction.
Call Alex Scott today to secure your land for your future.
Fantastic allotment of approx 595m2

Description:
Don't Miss This Opportunity
This well presented property in a convenient location offers scope to further improve and personalise. Featuring spacious living areas, generously sized bedrooms and a lovely established garden, this family friendly home will be sure to grab your attention.
A strikingly large living room with a wood heater and glimpses of the established garden is complimented by a spacious and fully equipped kitchen with an adjacent meals/family room. The three bedrooms are to the rear of the home and are serviced by a central family bathroom.
A covered deck overlooks the private and fenced rear yard and there is the added benefit of a small shed/bungalow. A single carport and side access mean that there is ample room for those seeking space for a boat or jetski.
Entry level homes like this are getting few and far between, so seize the day and make this one yours!
This property in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Calling All Holiday Property Investors!
Positioned in an idyllic location only 170m from the Anderson Road Boat Ramp, and beautiful sheltered bay beach - is this 4 bedroom townhouse.
The property offers excellent opportunity as a holiday rental investment, and has been appraised by a local Holiday rental Management company with the potential to achieve up to $25,000 per annum (appraisal information available for potential purchasers).
On the lower level, you will find 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes, a family bathroom, european laundry and internal access to the single garage.
Upstairs, is an open plan living, kitchen, dining, which leads out to a north facing balcony complete with glimpses of the bay - the perfect spot for summer barbecues or an evening cocktail. The master bedroom also with built in robes and ensuite, complete the home.
Also featuring:-
Split system heating/cooling
Ducted vacuum
Outdoor storage area
Alarm system
NBN available
A great spot to live, or an attractive property to add to your investment portfolio, the property is separately titled, no body corporate fees, and not only offers great holiday rental potential - but permanent rental also.
Contact us today to arrange an inspection!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.
